title: [Gameplay] Syndra E still bugged!
body:
Hello!

I was just spectating a game, and I noticed that a Syndra used her Q+E on a Viktor. Viktor was hit at MAX range (well outside of the E) took damage but was NOT stunned.

replies.body: Anyone got a video of this happening by any chance? I'd like to dig into what's going on here and any examples of the damage occurring without the stun would be really helpful.

I don't have a video from this patch at the ready, but this thread is full of examples from previous patches.  http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/8UbfJEPt-gameplay-syndras-broken-stunkb-10-patches-and-counting
Honestly, play Syndra one game.  Her stun doesn't proc 50% of the time, even when it's a direct hit.  My friend has quit playing Syndra completely because it's so frustrating to deal with.
Yeah this happened to me last night. If you are at the edge of her e and you shoot an orb at them they wont get stunned just pushed back like an inch
I've noticed this happening with Syndra players I play with/vs.
